summary.description:
A database of high-resolution MS/MS spectra for lichen metabolites.

The Global Natural Product Social Molecular Networking (GNPS) site creates a community for natural product researchers working with mass spectrometry data.

MassIVE Datasets : Documentation : Forum : Contact.

"2,8-Dimethyl-5,7-dimethoxychromone".

"5,7-Dihydroxy-2,6,8-trimethylchromone".
